changes.sql: CREATE TABLE applications (id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TRIGGER update_applications_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON applications FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION ratings_reviews.update_updated_at_column();
CREATE INDEX idx_applications_name_gin_trgm ON applications USING gin (name gin_trgm_ops);

CREATE TABLE ratings (id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), application_id UUID REFERENCES applications(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5), user_name VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TRIGGER update_ratings_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON ratings FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION ratings_reviews.update_updated_at_column();
CREATE TABLE application_rating_stats ( application_id UUID, scale smallint default 0, count bigint DEFAULT 0 , PRIMARY KEY (application_id, scale));
CREATE TRIGGER ratings_stats_insert AFTER INSERT ON ratings FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION ratings_reviews.update_application_rating_stats();

CREATE TABLE comments (id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), application_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES applications(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, user_id UUID NOT NULL, text TEXT NOT NULL, sentiment SMALLINT CHECK (sentiment IN (1, -1) OR sentiment IS NULL), level bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 CHECK (level >= 0), parent_id UUID REFERENCES comments(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TRIGGER update_comments_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON comments FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION ratings_reviews.update_updated_at_column();
CREATE INDEX idx_comments_application_id_sentiment ON comments(application_id, sentiment);
CREATE INDEX idx_comments_application_id_parent_id ON comments(application_id, parent_id);
